channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MO

item.title: Report X-2024040104
item.description:

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO PICK UP A LEAKER UNDER THE PD 4 RERUN SLIDE. UPON ARRIVAL IT WAS LEARNED THAT SAID LEAKER WAS INFACT A HAZMAT.

item.title: Report E-2024040086
item.description:
Report E-2024040086

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-08T15:12:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-21
  • City: SAINT LOUIS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Cargo release at terminal XSL. It was reported that approximately 3 gallons of THERMO-SORB VOC was released from two 5-gallon metal pails due to a forklift puncture. The release impacted the concrete at dock door 32.
